meaning_str.bing:
n. 翼；机翼；厢房；（飞行器的）翅膀
v. 飞行；被迅速送往
网络. 翼步；边锋；荣

翼；机翼；厢房；（飞行器的）翅膀

翼；翅膀；机翼；侧翼；派系；分支；（足球、曲棍球等运动中）边锋；远端边侧；附属机构；翼型构件；厢房；侧厅；挡泥板；耳房
飞；飞行；飞往；擦伤（尤指手臂或翅膀）；用力扔（某物）；射伤（鸟的）翅膀

1.en: A stroke is all dangerous of test, make me stronger, more humble, my hope have no broken wing.
1.cn: 一次次打击，都是凶险的考验，使我更坚强，更谦卑，我的希望没有折翼。

2.en: The wing clubs could have also been used to fight off predators, too, and this brings up an important point.
2.cn: 这种因翅膀结构产生的种群分区也能够用于干掉头领，并且，这是非常重要的一点。

3.en: Chinese scientists have developed a "Wing-In-Ground" aircraft which can fly long distances just a few feet above the sea surface.
3.cn: 中国科学家研制出“永在地上”飞机可飞长途跋涉只是一个几英尺以上的海面。

0.en: Jeff? Pop! I'm okay. I was on the other wing. They brought us to Jersey.
0.cn: 杰夫？老爸，我没事，我在另一边的机翼上，救援人员接我到了新泽西。

1.en: Nothing together. That's all right. Hell, I'll fly on the wing. Here we go. 22A, 6A and 6C.
1.cn: 没有连座了。没关系，让我坐机翼都行。票拿好，22排A座，6排A座，还有6排C座。

2.en: Good. Oh, FYI. After I eat my sandwich, I'm taking Koothrappali's Patang kite out for a test run. Would you like to get your delta-wing raptor and join me?
2.cn: 很好，顺便提醒你，我吃完三明治之后，我就带库萨帕里的帕唐风筝出去试飞一下，你想带着你的三角翼猛禽跟我一起去吗？

3.en: Thanks, Frank. Welcome to the West Wing. Thank you, sir.
3.cn: 谢谢 Frank，欢迎加入白宫。感谢您，总统先生。

4.en: Sell cupcakes at the diabetes wing at the children's hospital?

5.en: Put 'er there! Welcome! Sorry. And a hoof to a wing.
5.cn: 能握个手吗？欢迎你们！抱歉。蹄子握翅膀。

6.en: Rope off across the staircases and the back wing. Who are the guides?
6.cn: 用绳子把楼梯和后屋都拦上，谁做向导？

7.en: In my world, if I'm suspended or expelled, a wing is donated in the Bass name.
7.cn: 在我的世界里，如果我被勒令休学或者开除，有栋楼将因拜斯家族的捐助而树起。

8.en: I was a powerless and helpless boy, until a local sensei took me under his wing.
8.cn: 我当时是个无依无靠的男孩，直到当地的老师，收留了我。

9.en: Scroll back, please. To just after you lost your wing man. There. Play back, please.
9.cn: 请往回倒，回到你的僚机被击落的地方，那里，请重放。

10.en: So, yeah, I'm a kid. And I'm also a goofball. And a wing nut. And a Knucklehead McSpazatron.
10.cn: 是的，我是个孩子。我是个笨蛋，毛头小伙子，是个大笨蛋！

11.en: All right, Philip, tuck the wing tips under the body of the bird and place in a roasting pan.
11.cn: 好了，菲利普，把翅尖塞到火鸡肚子下面，然后放到烤盘上。

12.en: Chicago KSI headquarters is like a fortress. I'm gonna find a way into their top-secret military wing.
12.cn: KSI芝加哥总部就像一座堡垒，我会想办法混入最高军事机密区。

13.en: I drew up plans for a Duckingham Palace, but I can't find them, so I guess we'll just have to "wing" it.
13.cn: 我画了好几种鸭金汉宫的修建草图，不过我找不到图纸了，看来我们只能现场发挥[翅膀]了。

14.en: Oh, really? Did you make a second date? Well, no, we sort of decided to wing it. Oh, even I know that's lame.
14.cn: 真的？你俩定了下一次约会吗？这倒没有...我们说好了，到时候再想。得了吧，连我都觉得这太逊了。

15.en: Everyone's to keep their feet firmly on the ground while I take Mr. Longbottom to the hospital wing. Understand?
15.cn: 现在大家都老老实实地在地上呆着，我送隆巴顿先生去医院，懂了吗？

16.en: I built this whole wing. I kept firing the architects and builders, so no-one knew quite how it all fitted together.
16.cn: 这一区的病房是我建的。建筑师和建筑工人被我开了一个又一个，所以没人知道这儿的整体设计。

17.en: Okay. When you walk into the museum, take a right, okay? That's the antiquities wing. Ancient Egypt, Mesopotamia, up to the Byzantine Empire.
17.cn: 当你们进入博物馆时，先向右转，那边是古代文物厅，古埃及、美索不达米亚直到拜占庭帝国……

18.en: Master, I just want to assure you that I had no part in this hopeless plan. Preparing a dinner, designing a gown for her, giving her a suite in the east wing.
18.cn: 主人,我只是想向你保证我没参与这悲催的计划。准备晚餐，为她设计礼服，给她一间在东塔的卧室。

19.en: Yeah. Right! People eat birds. Bird meat. Now do they just fly into your mouth? Or you go in a restaurant and say: Excuse me, I'll have a bucket of fried bird. Or maybe just a wing. Or a…
19.cn: 嗯，是喔！人类会吃小鸟，小鸟肉，他们是直接飞进你的嘴里吗？ 还是你可以到餐厅说：“不好意思，我要点一份炸鸟”或是一个翅膀，或是…
